Failed to start tracker. This is most li.id: Gagal memulai pelacakan. Kemungkinan karena installasi yang korup.

[Error]\nTracker process is gone. Toggle.en:
[Error]
Tracker process is gone. Toggle face tracking off and on in the "General settings" to restart it. This issue is most likely caused by incompatible camera settings. You can try changing them on the starting screen. It could also be caused by a corrupted installation.
[Error]\nTracker process is gone. Toggle.ja:
[Error]
Tracker process is gone. Toggle face tracking off and on in the "General settings" to restart it. This issue is most likely caused by incompatible camera settings. You can try changing them on the starting screen. It could also be caused by a corrupted installation.
[Error]\nTracker process is gone. Toggle.id:
[Error]
Proses pelacakan hilang. Matikan dan nyalakan pelacakan wajah di "Pengaturan umum" untuk me restart. Ini dapat di sebabkan oleh pengaturan kamera yang tidak cocok. Kamu dapat mencoba mengubah nya di jendela awal. Bisa juga di sebabkan oleh installasi yang korup.

Post processing effects will increase sy.en:
Post processing effects will increase system load. They are currently still experimental and may not always produce the desired results. Specifically, they basically do not affect areas outside the avatar.

On my system, enabling post processing and all effects slightly increases CPU utilization and slightly more than doubles GPU utilization. Enabling less effects will have less impact, so only enable what you actually need.
Post processing effects will increase sy.ja:
Post processing effects will increase system load. They are currently still experimental and may not always produce the desired results. Specifically, they basically do not affect areas outside the avatar.

On my system, enabling post processing and all effects slightly increases CPU utilization and slightly more than doubles GPU utilization. Enabling less effects will have less impact, so only enable what you actually need.
Post processing effects will increase sy.id:
Efek post proses akan membuat beban sistem bertambah. Sedang dalam status uji coba dan mungkin tidak akan selalu efek yang di inginkan. Spesifik nya, efek tidak akan berpengaruh pada area di luar avatar.

Pada sistem saya, menyalakan post proses dan semua efek sedikit meningkatkan pemakaian cpu dan 2x pemakaian gpu. Meyalakan sedikit efek akan menimbulkan efek yang kecil, jadi nyalakan yang hanya di perlukan saja.

If you encounter odd shadows around the.en: If you encounter odd shadows around the eyes, caused by the eye lash meshes, try setting the material to cutout.
If you encounter odd shadows around the.ja: If you encounter odd shadows around the eyes, caused by the eye lash meshes, try setting the material to cutout.
If you encounter odd shadows around the.id: Jika kamu mengalami bayangan aneh di sekitar mata, menyebabkan alis menyatu, coba untuk atur material ke cutout.

Notes:\n\n- After hitting the start butt.en:
Notes:

- After hitting the start button, wiggle around your mouth and eyebrows and blink for a second or two. This helps the face tracker to warm up. Slowly turning your head left and right can't hurt either.

- If you encounter unexpected tracking issues, please make sure that there is enough light for your camera. Also make sure that no strong source of light is behind you.

- To reduce CPU consumption, first lower FPS (e.g. to 30 or 15). If things are too slow, try the "Fast" model.

- To modify expressions of a VRM file, edit the BlendShapeProxy in Unity. The "Surprise" expression can be added under the name "Surprised".

- You can enable the experimental expression detection feature in the settings. Note: Calibrating your expressions for the first time will take some time if you want them to be recognized reliably.

- Before jumping in, take a moment to think about how you can pull different faces to represent each expression. The more different your faces, the easier it will be to recognize them.

- When calibrating expressions, save often. If, by accident, you record expression data that does not fit the expression, reload your latest save. The clear button will reset all data for an expression and should only be used as a last resort.

- Once you have calibrated your expressions, after starting the tracker again, take a moment and check that each is recognized correctly. If there are any issues, add a bit of additional data.
Notes:\n\n- After hitting the start butt.ja:
Notes:

- After hitting the start button, wiggle around your mouth and eyebrows and blink for a second or two. This helps the face tracker to warm up. Slowly turning your head left and right can't hurt either.

- If you encounter unexpected tracking issues, please make sure that there is enough light for your camera. Also make sure that no strong source of light is behind you.

- To reduce CPU consumption, first lower FPS (e.g. to 30 or 15). If things are too slow, try the "Fast" model.

- To modify expressions of a VRM file, edit the BlendShapeProxy in Unity. The "Surprise" expression can be added under the name "Surprised".

- You can enable the experimental expression detection feature in the settings. Note: Calibrating your expressions for the first time will take some time if you want them to be recognized reliably.

- Before jumping in, take a moment to think about how you can pull different faces to represent each expression. The more different your faces, the easier it will be to recognize them.

- When calibrating expressions, save often. If, by accident, you record expression data that does not fit the expression, reload your latest save. The clear button will reset all data for an expression and should only be used as a last resort.

- Once you have calibrated your expressions, after starting the tracker again, take a moment and check that each is recognized correctly. If there are any issues, add a bit of additional data.

You can use the following hotkeys to qui.en:
You can use the following hotkeys to quickly use various functions inside this program.<size=50%>

</size>Space	Show/hide the UI hide ※ button
R		Reset avatar pose
Shift+R	Reset avatar pose thoroughly
S		Take a high res screenshot
Shift+S	Take a screenshot after 3 sec
L		Load a new VRM avatar
C		Reset the camera
D		Reset the light's direction
You can use the following hotkeys to qui.ja:
You can use the following hotkeys to quickly use various functions inside this program.<size=50%>

</size>Space	Show/hide the UI hide ※ button
R		Reset avatar pose
Shift+R	Reset avatar pose thoroughly
S		Take a high res screenshot
Shift+S	Take a screenshot after 3 sec
L		Load a new VRM avatar
C		Reset the camera
D		Reset the light's direction

Global hotkeys can be used from anywhere.en:
Global hotkeys can be used from anywhere, even if this program is not in focus.

Pressing Ctrl+Shift+F1 to Ctrl+Shift+F6 will enforce the corresponding expression (Neutral, Fun, Angry, Joy, Sorrow, Surprise). Pressing it again will stop the expression, but you can also directly switch to a different one.

Pressing Ctrl+Shift+F7 will toggle Leap Motion based hand tracking on and off.
Global hotkeys can be used from anywhere.ja:
Global hotkeys can be used from anywhere, even if this program is not in focus.

Pressing Ctrl+Shift+F1 to Ctrl+Shift+F6 will enforce the corresponding expression (Neutral, Fun, Angry, Joy, Sorrow, Surprise). Pressing it again will stop the expression, but you can also directly switch to a different one.

Pressing Ctrl+Shift+F7 will toggle Leap Motion based hand tracking on and off.

Setting a different background color for.en:
Setting a different background color for use with chroma keying is not supported. Instead, you can capture from this program with true alpha transparency, which allows you to use any color combinations in your avatar and even allows for semi-transparent objects.

To do this, press the ※ button in the lower right corner. You can press the space key to hide and show this button.

After hiding the UI, the background will show a checkboard pattern. Use a "Game Capture" source in <u><link="https://obsproject.com/">OBS Studio</link></u> (or Streamlabs OBS) to capture this window and tick the "Allow Transparency" box. The checkboard pattern will disappear in OBS and turn transparent.
Setting a different background color for.ja:
Setting a different background color for use with chroma keying is not supported. Instead, you can capture from this program with true alpha transparency, which allows you to use any color combinations in your avatar and even allows for semi-transparent objects.

To do this, press the ※ button in the lower right corner. You can press the space key to hide and show this button.

After hiding the UI, the background will show a checkboard pattern. Use a "Game Capture" source in <u><link="https://obsproject.com/">OBS Studio</link></u> (or Streamlabs OBS) to capture this window and tick the "Allow Transparency" box. The checkboard pattern will disappear in OBS and turn transparent.

For more useful hints on using this prog.en: For more useful hints on using this program, check out the usage notes button. Also, the blue bars mean you are close to the edge of the camera image, so you might not want to move further in that direction. They won't show up in OBS. And check the <u><link="https://www.vseeface.icu/">manual</link></u>.
For more useful hints on using this prog.ja: For more useful hints on using this program, check out the usage notes button. Also, the blue bars mean you are close to the edge of the camera image, so you might not want to move further in that direction. They won't show up in OBS. And check the <u><link="https://www.vseeface.icu/">manual</link></u>.

Each expression, including the neutral o.en: Each expression, including the neutral one, has a number of settings that can be configured. An expression can be a base or additive expression. Only one base expression can be active at a time, but additive expressions are added on top of others. Mouth, eye blink and eyebrow animation can be disabled. A global hotkey can be assigned for every expression. If it is set to "Hold", the expression is enabled while the key is held. If set to "Toggle", it will turn on and off with each button press. The transition slider can be used to set how long the smooth transition time to or from this expressions should be, from instantaneous to half a second.
Each expression, including the neutral o.ja: Each expression, including the neutral one, has a number of settings that can be configured. An expression can be a base or additive expression. Only one base expression can be active at a time, but additive expressions are added on top of others. Mouth, eye blink and eyebrow animation can be disabled. A global hotkey can be assigned for every expression. If it is set to "Hold", the expression is enabled while the key is held. If set to "Toggle", it will turn on and off with each button press. The transition slider can be used to set how long the smooth transition time to or from this expressions should be, from instantaneous to half a second.

Eyebrow tracking is supported for <u><li.en: Eyebrow tracking is supported for <u><link="https://vroid.com/en/studio/">VRoid</link></u> and <u><link="https://fantia.jp/posts/164261">Cecil Henshin</link></u> models. The strength of eyebrow motion can be set in the "General settings". To customize eyebrow animation or make it work for other model types, add two custom <u><link="https://vrm.dev/en/univrm/components/univrm_blendshape/">VRM blendshape clips</link></u> (<u><link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ECZXlzlIcKU">Video</link></u>) named "Brows up" and "Brows down", which also allows properly mixing them with expressions.
Eyebrow tracking is supported for <u><li.ja: Eyebrow tracking is supported for <u><link="https://vroid.com/en/studio/">VRoid</link></u> and <u><link="https://fantia.jp/posts/164261">Cecil Henshin</link></u> models. The strength of eyebrow motion can be set in the "General settings". To customize eyebrow animation or make it work for other model types, add two custom <u><link="https://vrm.dev/en/univrm/components/univrm_blendshape/">VRM blendshape clips</link></u> (<u><link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ECZXlzlIcKU">Video</link></u>) named "Brows up" and "Brows down", which also allows properly mixing them with expressions.

The expression detection calibration pro.en:
The expression detection calibration process is a bit tedious and painful, so make sure to bring time. To use it, first enable it from the general settings menu. You can find a video walkthrough for the calibration process <u><link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Y2JyGLxuyo">here</link></u>:

- Make an expression with your face. More extreme expressions are easier to detect.
- Press the corresponding button to start recording.
- Move and turn your head around and talk while holding the expression.
- Press the button again to stop recording.
- Relax your face.
- Repeat this for all expressions.
- Press "Calibrate" and test the results.
- If an expression gives you trouble, record more and "Calibrate" again.
- If an expression is misdetected for a certain head pose, try recording more data for it in that pose.
- Save when you are happy.
The expression detection calibration pro.ja:
The expression detection calibration process is a bit tedious and painful, so make sure to bring time. To use it, first enable it from the general settings menu. You can find a video walkthrough for the calibration process <u><link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Y2JyGLxuyo">here</link></u>:

- Make an expression with your face. More extreme expressions are easier to detect.
- Press the corresponding button to start recording.
- Move and turn your head around and talk while holding the expression.
- Press the button again to stop recording.
- Relax your face.
- Repeat this for all expressions.
- Press "Calibrate" and test the results.
- If an expression gives you trouble, record more and "Calibrate" again.
- If an expression is misdetected for a certain head pose, try recording more data for it in that pose.
- Save when you are happy.

The direction of light can be changed wi.en: The direction of light can be changed with Ctrl+Left click. The camera can be rotated with Alt+Left click. Alt+Right click or Alt+Mouse wheel can be used to zoom in and out. Alt+Middle click or Ctrl+Right click can be used to drag the view.
The direction of light can be changed wi.ja: The direction of light can be changed with Ctrl+Left click. The camera can be rotated with Alt+Left click. Alt+Right click or Alt+Mouse wheel can be used to zoom in and out. Alt+Middle click or Ctrl+Right click can be used to drag the view.

<align=\"center\">[Error]</align>\nThe f.en:
<align="center">[Error]</align>
The face tracker process is gone. You can try:
1) Making sure nothing else is using the camera
2) Toggling face tracking off and on in the "General settings" to restart it
3) Restarting VSeeFace and changing the camera settings
4) Redownloading VSeeFace and reinstalling it
<align=\"center\">[Error]</align>\nThe f.ja:
<align="center">[Error]</align>
The face tracker process is gone. You can try:
1) Making sure nothing else is using the camera
2) Toggling face tracking off and on in the "General settings" to restart it
3) Restarting VSeeFace and changing the camera settings
4) Redownloading VSeeFace and reinstalling it
